ACCOMMODATION

For accommodation in Barcelona, we recommend the hotel NN Gran Via. This is a great property located at the city centre, just few steps from main attractions of the city. Also this hotel offers very good value for money and it is the closer option to Fira Gran Via, the venue of The Mobile World Congress.

Main Hotel: NN Gran Via
